titles.title: EQUIP Act of 2020

To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a demonstration program to facilitate the clinical adoption of pregnancy intention screening initiatives by health care and social service providers.
Enhancing Questions to Understand Intentions for Pregnancy Act of 2020
EQUIP Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Enhancing Questions to Understand Intentions for Pregnancy Act of 2020 or the EQUIP Act of 2020
This bill requires the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to provide eligible health organizations with demonstration program grants to implement routine screenings about women's pregnancy intentions in order to provide better contraceptive and prepregnancy care.
